title: Images of the land: 100 years of Australian landscapes
creator_credit: Ian Stocks and Queensland Film Corporation
brief_description: Highlights the work of some of Australia’s most important artists from the 19th century to the present time. Includes the works of Arthur Streeton, Hans Heysen, Russell Drysdale, Sidney Nolan, Fred Williams and others who present us with their visions of the Australian landscape.
title_for_label: Images of the land: 100 years of Australian landscapes
